purpose: Enable users to create complex data visualizations effortlessly using AI
principle: Leverages AI algorithms to automatically generate visualization recommendations and render data insights
reusability: Offers APIs for integration with data sources and visualization platforms, supports plug-and-play components for dashboards
limitations: May require significant computational resources for large datasets, visualization options might be limited to predefined templates
